name: trip-web-client
description: Trip Recording and Itinerary Planner web client

scripts.dist-update-index-async: node -e "require('shelljs/global'); sed('-i', /    \/\/ You need to run .npm run update-index-async. to inject the angular async code here/, sed(/sourceMappingURL=angular-loader.min.js.map/,'sourceMappingURL=bower_components/angular-loader/angular-loader.min.js.map','app/bower_components/angular-loader/angular-loader.min.js'), 'dist/app/index-async.html');"
scripts.update-index-async: node -e "require('shelljs/global'); sed('-i', /    \/\/ You need to run .npm run update-index-async. to inject the angular async code here/, sed(/sourceMappingURL=angular-loader.min.js.map/,'sourceMappingURL=bower_components/angular-loader/angular-loader.min.js.map','app/bower_components/angular-loader/angular-loader.min.js'), 'app/index-async.html');"
scripts.update-index-prod: node -e "require('shelljs/global'); sed('-i', /^\s+<script src=\"js\/.*\.js\"><\/script>\s*$/, '', 'dist/app/index.html'); sed('-i', /^\s+<!-- <script src=\"trip.min.js\"><\/script> -->\s*$/, '  <script src=\"trip.min.js\"></script>', 'dist/app/index.html');"
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:css
scripts.build-release: npm run disable-debug && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run dist && npm run update-index-prod && npm run dist-update-index-async && npm run update-index-async-prod && npm run enable-debug
